prolouge: Welcome Stranger! This is my first webapplication. I hope you will enjoy this adventure with me.

questions.story: It is a really cold morning today. Your head hurt as hell and you can not remember anything. You decided to descover where you are and what happend. As you open your eyes, you can see that you are in an old wood house. It is in a bad condition, but there is a fireplace where the fire was already gone, and you are laying on a dirty bed. You can check the outside or you can look around better in the room. Which you choose?

answers.text: I look out on the window.
I can see something under the bed.

questions.story: You are walking to the window and you see a beautfil view on a lake and lots of tree aournd the house. This place is in a forest.
You look around but there is not too much things in this room, but it is a chest under your bed. You open it and there are clothes int there.
